data.title: Another delicious meal
data.text: I have had numerous meals here and it continues to deliver very tasty food.We have tried many dishes and haven't had a bad dish yet. The food is creative and different than the run of the mill Japanese food. This time we tried dessert-the ice cream filled macaroni they have in a freezer by the door. I had green tea and my husband the mango ice cream. The macaroni were chewy and perfect. Loved it and dinner will always be topped off with one of these.

data.title: Another Delicious Modern Japanese Meal
data.text: I love this restaurant. The food is consistently good. The sushi varied, modern and so tasty. The cucumber wrapped sushi is a favourite along with the mango one. Yum Yum. Their kitchens closing time on the weekend was reasonable-10 or 10.30pm from memory? We stay in Downey when in LA so it is a local which is great. I will be back.

data.title: Great for take out
data.text:
I love the fact this place makes rolls without rice , just cucumber wrapped around sushi.
I have not found another place in Downey offering this choice

data.title: Great experience!
data.text: Was staying at the Embassy Suites with my 16 y/o son and this was within walking distance! This was a great local spot and sushi was really good. Our waiter also was very good. Prices very reasonable if you do the dinner combo.

data.title: Yummy Sushi
data.text: The sushi here is awesome! The best I have ever had. Definitely a great place to go to. I didn't try their ice cream filled macaroons but I how to before I leave. :)

data.title: Walking distance from Embassy suites
data.text: The food here was very good and it was fresh .  I'll say it in the block sections later but for the amount of food we got we felt that the bill was very reasonable .  As we live in the country it is refreshing to find a sushi restaurant that is good and not overly expensive .  The atmosphere was more than acceptable and comfortable and the service was very good .

data.title: Nice hidden sushi house
data.text: Delicious spicy tuna roll.  Great sea bass dish. Small but very good quality.  Spicy chicken plate very flavorful

data.title: Food is great. Service is horrendous
data.text:
Sushi is awesome and fresh. But it's all downhill from there. Staff is not trained in hospitality nor manners. I wasn't even done ordering and the lady was already grabbing the menu from my hands. What the heck? Not even ones did anybody pass by and offer us refills nor ask us is everything ok with your food. It's like if the staff is afraid of talking to the customers. 
If owner is reading this please do something about your staff hospitality training. The way it is now it makes want to think 3 times before returning here. Even if your food is good.

data.title: Outstanding Sushi!
data.text:
I stopped by there for lunch today and it was absolutely delicious. The service was very fast and very friendly. I opted to eat at the sushi bar which was a good decision as it turned out to be.

I decided to go with the Hungry Roll which had everything I wanted and more. The roll was just perfect for lunch and a great pairing with the hot sake. The fact that it was warm made it even more tasty. This place is great even though it a little pricy. But overall, a fantastic option for lunch!

data.title: Very Yummy Sushi In Downey
data.text: This is the third time we have been here and love the food. It is different, tasty and so delicious. This is the first time though we have not sat at the bar and the bar is the best place to watch the chefs in action and provides some entertainment.

data.title: Great Sushi
data.text:
This place was delicious!! Yes its a bit pricey but worth it, you get good service (waitresses werent that great but it was decent) delicious food and no long crazy waits. 

When i went we had the bakes lobster and baked salmon both were delicious! if you dont like spicy then the lobster one is not one for you. 

Really looking forward to going back here again

data.title: Good sushi bit little pricy.
data.text: This is relatively a new place in Downey. Decided to try because I was craving for sushi and did not want to drive too far. I was greeted by the host. It was very quite despite it was Sunday dinner time. I decided to sit at the bar. Service was very quick. Menu was rich. First thing I realized was the prices; they were high. I ordered Pensilvania roll and there were eight pieces. I liked it very much. Very good sushi. Restaurant looked very clean. Another positive note was the chopsticks; they were very high quality. Overall it's a very good sushi restaurant except not very economical.

data.title: Good sushi!
data.text: My buddy and I tried this place for the first time, and was really impressed with the menu options Starfish Sushi offers. I was really happy when I saw the Baked Salmon Roll in the menu, and I immediately ordered it; my friend had the Dragon Rolls. The service was decent; waitresses can be a bit more perky than serious. I would come back again!
